Notes: 1 GB ≈ 114 minutes of uncompressed CD audio
1.9 TB ≈ Size of all multimedia files used in English wikipedia on May 2012
10 PB ≈ Size of Library of Congress collection in 2005
15 EB ≈ storage space at Google data warehouse as of 2013
6.9 ZB ≈ amount of data accessed by Americans in 2012
1 YB ≈ 131 TB for every person on Earth
